sentences.en: A gentile is person that is not a Jew.
sentences.cn: 非犹太人就是指不属于犹太民族的人.

sentences.en: And there are radical messages being spread by people who would kill every moderate Muslim, Jew, Gentile and agnostic alike.
sentences.cn: 有人散布激进言论，要杀死每个温和的穆斯林、犹太人、非犹太人和不可知论者。

sentences.en: But it is difficult to determine what gentile name was borne by married women.
sentences.cn: 但是,确定已婚妇女的血族名称却成了一种困难.

sentences.en: But there were the Gentile washwoman who came to the house to fetch our laundry.
sentences.cn: 不过那时有不是犹太人的洗衣妇来我们家取洗衣物.

sentences.en: Claudio Gentile's ability to man - mark opposing forwards was legendary.
sentences.cn: 克劳迪奥.詹蒂莱出任盯人 后卫 冻结对方的前锋的能力是传奇的.
French( 法国的)是个说明国籍的形容词.

sentences.en: Her family disowned her for marrying a gentile.
sentences.cn: 她的家庭坚决不同意她嫁给一名异教徒.

sentences.en: Her mother is a delicate and gentile dark woman.
sentences.cn: 她母亲肤色浅黑,是位谈吐优雅的基督徒.

sentences.en: It could have been written by a Gentile who just happens to be very well educated in Jewish scripture and has picked up also this Jewish exegetical kind of technique, which is what he uses.
sentences.cn: 它也可能是个非犹太人写的,那人碰巧受到过良好的犹太教经文教育,并且也学了这种犹太人的注释技巧，并且用了这种技巧。

sentences.en: Jew, Gentile, black men, white. We all to help one another, human beings are like that.
sentences.cn: 犹太人 、 非犹太人 、 黑人 、 白人, 我们都想互相帮助, 人都是这样的.

sentences.en: So he was apparently a God - fearing Gentile, and somewhat wealthy.
sentences.cn: 这表示他是个敬拜神的外邦人, 也相当有钱.

sentences.en: That was still the old gentile spirit.
The other parts of Dr Gentile's study looked at established behaviour.
sentences.cn: Gentile博士 这次研究的其他部分着眼于既定行为.

sentences.en: These men refused to share in the'love - feast'with the Gentile believers.
sentences.cn: 其后来的那批犹太人不愿意跟外邦信徒一同分享[爱筵].

sentences.en: This would " keep the peace between Jew and Gentile Christians. "
sentences.cn: 这样能保持犹太人与外邦人基督之间的和平.

sentences.en: Thus the blessing is offered to both Jew and Gentile.
sentences.cn: 所以这福是同时赐予犹太人和非犹太人的.

sentences.en: Why do we have to have a gentile street running through our area?
sentences.cn: 为什么非得要有一条非犹太人的街道穿过我们的地区?

trans.tran_cn: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 金泰尔 Gentle的变体
